mapper.select:
select
from o_userorders where Status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by OrderTime desc

select
from o_userorders where UserId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by OrderTime desc

select
from o_userorders where UserId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by OrderTime desc limit 1

select
from o_userorders where UserId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by OrderTime desc

select
from o_userorders where AgentUserId = #{agentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and Status=2 and IsBranch=0 order by PayTime desc

select
from o_userorders where Status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} and OrderType in(0,1) order by PayTime desc,OrderTime desc
select a.* from o_userorders a,o_orderproducts b where a.UserOrderId=b.UserOrderId and b.CartId=#{cartid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.OrderType= #{ordertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select a.* from o_userorders a,o_orderproducts b where a.UserOrderId=b.UserOrderId and b.CartId=#{cartid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.UserId=#{branchuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
